text: Reminder: For WooParts, only select AMZL if the EDD is 1-3 days. We are aiming to deliver the item a day or two earlier than the actual EDD. This is for metrics purposes.
For AutoApex, only use FedEx and UPS until further notice. Do not select AMZL and USPS.
AutoApex will use the same shipping account as WooParts.
Do not use AMZL for AutoApex until further notice. Use only UPS, USPS, or FedEx, with a $3 bias.
WooParts will resume using AMZL as a carrier, with an expected delivery window of 1–3 days—preferably delivering 1 day earlier than the estimated delivery date.
